meanings.definition: Achieves the desired aim or result.
meanings.sent1: She succeeds in solving the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: He always succeeds in making his mother proud.
meanings.sent3: The cat succeeds in catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower succeeds in reaching towards the sun.
meanings.sent5: The determined student succeeds in mastering the difficult subject.

meanings.sent1: Winter succeeds autumn in the yearly cycle.
meanings.sent2: The second book succeeds the first in the series.
meanings.sent3: The clown succeeds the magician in the circus act.
meanings.sent4: Laughter succeeds tears in lifting the spirits.
meanings.sent5: The new day succeeds the night, bringing light and warmth.
